column4: huh... debian has MySQLdb-1.2.1_p2 in unstable. But edgy seems to have a sub package. Not sure about the differences involved there - can anyone enlighten me whether I can expect 1.2.1_p2 in edgy?
or another mkfs as you wish
is ubuntu aware of dependencies in packages installed with dpkg -i?
you have to manually resolve deps when installing with dpkg
